attributes.action: ensure that all towns or cities of above 500,000 inhabitents have an intergrated public transport system, where busses meet trains at stations  and every effort is made to reduce car journeys.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too often dwellings are located far from any public transport. Too often large scale building projects have ignored public transport access. Initially therefore all urban area should be obliged to have buses  meet trains at stations, with guaranteed connections to enabled car free journeys to be made as easily as possible.
